basis: The user consistently postpones action, requests ultra-low-pressure prompts, and plans to check in only when ready. This history suggests a very low likelihood of taking a concrete step soon, even if verbally open to future prompts.
coaching_notes: Persist with ultra-light, non-eating prompts and focus on non-action grounding and hydration. Plan for a check-in only when they signal readiness. Monitor heat-related stress and adjust pacing to their pace; avoid introducing new targets until readiness clearly shifts.
